translation.en: -Oh, hey. Listen, I was-- -[teen] Well, well, well.
translation.zh:
‎-嗨 你听我说 我刚才…
‎-天啊

translation.en: Looks like they sent us the perfect woman for the job.
translation.zh:
‎看来他们派了一个才貌双全的女人
‎来胜任这个差事

translation.en: Oh, crap. What kind of ranch did I walk into?
translation.zh: ‎糟糕 我到底闯进了什么牧场？

translation.en: Horses, mostly. You like horses?
translation.zh: ‎这里养的多数是马 你喜欢马吗？

translation.en: -Not that much. -Wait!
translation.zh:
‎-还好
‎-等一下！

translation.en: -Aren't you from the nanny agency? -No.
translation.zh:
‎-你不是保姆中介公司派来的人吗？
‎-不是

translation.en: Dang. Do you have any experience taking care of kids?
translation.zh: ‎该死的 你有没有带小孩的经验？

translation.en: -No. -Have any experience lyin'? I do.
translation.zh:
‎-没有
‎-你有没有说谎的经验？我有

translation.en: Hey, y'all! Come meet our new nanny! I'm Tuck, and you are?
translation.zh: ‎各位 来瞧瞧我们新来的保姆！ ‎我叫塔克 怎么称呼你？

translation.en: Not a nanny. Look, my truck died, my phone died.
translation.zh:
‎我不是保姆 ‎听着 我的卡车抛锚了 手机没电了
‎我只想借用你家电话…

translation.en: -I just need to use your phone-- -[Tuck] Y'all, get down here!
translation.zh:
‎听着 我的卡车抛锚了 手机没电了
‎我只想借用你家电话…  ‎各位 快下来！

translation.en: -Everybody, this is our new nanny. -I'm not a nanny.
translation.zh:
‎各位 ‎-这位是我们家新来的保姆
‎-我不是

translation.en: New nanny, that's Brody, Dylan, and Chloe.
translation.zh:
‎新来的保姆
‎他们是布洛迪、迪伦和蔻依

translation.en: Hey, y'all. Is your mama or daddy around?
translation.zh: ‎大家好 你们爸妈在家吗？

translation.en: I'm having a breakdown. My truck, and emotional.
translation.zh: ‎我的卡车和心情都崩了

translation.en: Actually, our mama died two years ago.
translation.zh: ‎其实我们的妈妈两年前过世了

translation.en: Oh, I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 节哀顺变

translation.en: -Thank you. -And thanks for showing up, Nanny…
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢
‎-感谢你愿意过来 保姆…

translation.en: No, Bailey. Just Bailey. I just need to use your phone,
translation.zh:
‎别叫我保姆 叫我贝莉就行了
‎我只是想跟你们借电话

translation.en: call a mechanic, get back home, wherever that is.
translation.zh:
‎打去叫技工过来
‎然后回家 回到哪里都行

translation.en: You forgot where you live? Did you check the tag on your backpack?
translation.zh:
‎你忘记自己住在哪里吗？
‎查过背包标签上的地址了吗？

translation.en: Honey, I wish it were that simple. Never date a musician.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的 如果是这么简单就好了
‎永远不要跟音乐人交往

translation.en: Oh, honey. It's okay.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 没事的

translation.en: It's okay. I just need to use a phone.
translation.zh: ‎没事的 我只是想跟你们借电话

translation.en: Cell phone. Home phone. Xylophone.
translation.zh: ‎手机、家用电话、木琴什么的

translation.en: -Oh, is that a phone? -[Tuck] It doesn't matter.
translation.zh:
‎-那是电话吗？
‎-没用的

translation.en: -Storm knocked out all the phone service. -Of course it did. Why do you hate me?
translation.zh:
‎-暴风雨阻断了所有通讯
‎-可不是吗？你为什么恨我？

translation.en: Look how good she is with children!
translation.zh: ‎瞧瞧她多懂得带孩子！

translation.en: She's straight up Mary Poppins, bro. I think nanny number ten is a winner.
translation.zh:
‎她简直就是仙女玛莉下凡
‎看来这第十个保姆

translation.en: Ten nannies? What is wrong with y'all?
translation.zh: ‎十个保姆？你们到底怎么了？

translation.en: Her. She's got some anger issues.
translation.zh: ‎是她有问题 她脾气暴躁

translation.en: Are you kiddin' me?
translation.zh: ‎开什么玩笑？

translation.en: We're not hiring her just 'cause you fools think she's hot.
translation.zh:
‎休想因为你们几个傻子看她火辣
‎就决定雇用她

translation.en: "You fools" think I'm hot?
translation.zh: ‎“你们几个傻子”看我辣吗？

translation.en: -Smokin'! -So hot.
translation.zh:
‎-辣到冒烟！
‎-超辣的

translation.en: You have no idea how much that means to me.
translation.zh:
‎你们不知道这么说
‎对我来说意义有多重大

translation.en: You can't imagine what I've been through, and for y'all to think--
translation.zh:
‎你们肯定想象不到我刚经历过什么
‎竟然觉得我很辣…

translation.en: Résumé, ma'am. I… I don't have a résumé, because I'm--
translation.zh:
‎-这位女士 给我履历表
‎-我没有履历表 因为我是…

translation.en: Because you think you can just stroll through life on your good looks?
translation.zh:
‎你以为长得漂亮
‎就能在生活上如鱼得水吗？

translation.en: No, because I'm not equipped to do anything. [sobs lightly]
translation.zh: ‎不是 因为我没有做任何事的经验

translation.en: Tell you what, we'll double whatever you were making at your last job,
translation.zh:
‎你听我说
‎我们愿意付你上一份工作的两倍薪资

translation.en: unless, of course, we find out you were fired,
translation.zh: ‎但如果我们发现你是被前东家炒掉的

translation.en: in which case we'll have to cut your salary in half and strip your bonuses
translation.zh:
‎那我们只好
‎扣除你一半薪资和减少奖金

translation.en: until you prove yourself. It's called playing hardball, people.
translation.zh:
‎除非你证明自己有实力
‎各位 这叫采取“强硬手段”

translation.en: Sweetie, you mind sittin' next to me? I'm a little scared of thunder.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的 介意坐到我身边来吗？
‎我有点害怕打雷

translation.en: Well, I guess if you're scared.
translation.zh: ‎既然你害怕 我就来了

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: ‎没事的

translation.en: Lord help me, another brother?
translation.zh: ‎老天救命啊 又来了一个哥哥？

translation.en: Ah! You flatter me. I'm actually the daddy of all these.
translation.zh:
‎承蒙夸奖
‎我其实是这几个孩子的老爸

translation.en: And I'm the daddy's girlfriend of all these.
translation.zh: ‎而我是这几个孩子的老爸的女朋友

translation.en: Well, you are early for your interview, and I like that.
translation.zh: ‎你比预定的面试时间早到 我喜欢

translation.en: -Oh, actually, Mr.-- -Beau.
translation.zh:
‎-其实 这位先生…
‎-叫我保哥

translation.en: -Mr. Beau-- -No, Beau's my first name.
translation.zh:
‎-保先生…
‎-不对 “保”是我的名字

translation.en: -Beau Beau? -Just Beau.
translation.zh:
‎-所以你叫“保保”？
‎-叫我保哥就行了

translation.en: Just… Just my Beau. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎保哥是我的男朋友

translation.en: And who might you be? Oh, I'm Bailey. I was--
translation.zh:
‎-怎么称呼你？
‎-我叫贝莉 我是…

translation.en: Our new nanny.
translation.zh: ‎我们家新来的保姆

translation.en: Bailey, Summer. Summer, Bailey.
translation.zh: ‎贝莉 这位是莎莫 ‎莎莫 这位是贝莉

translation.en: All right, let's go, Daddy. Can't be late.
translation.zh: ‎好了 走吧 老爸 不能迟到

translation.en: -See ya after school, Nanny. -Whoa, hold on there, Tuck.
translation.zh: ‎保姆 放学后见 ‎等一下 塔克

translation.en: [laughing] Your daddy hasn't even checked her references yet.
translation.zh: ‎你老爸还没看过她的推荐人呢

translation.en: She thinks I look like their brother. You're hired.
translation.zh:
‎她觉得我看起来像他们的哥哥
‎你被录取了

translation.en: Why are we wasting time?
translation.zh: ‎有必要浪费时间吗？

translation.en: She's young, she's pretty, she's great with kids.
translation.zh: ‎她既年轻漂亮 又懂得带孩子

translation.en: -I'm not a nanny! -That will greatly reduce your salary.
translation.zh:
‎-我不是保姆！
‎-那你的薪资会大大减少

translation.en: Bailey, if you're not a nanny, what exactly you doin' in our house?
translation.zh:
‎贝莉 既然你不是保姆
‎那你到底为什么会出现在我们家？

translation.en: Well, it all started last night
translation.zh: ‎一切从昨晚开始

translation.en: when me and my boyfriend, Boone, were singing at Tootsies.
translation.zh:
‎昨晚我和我的男朋友布恩
‎在小脚兰花酒吧驻唱

translation.en: Our band's been playing that club forever,
translation.zh: ‎我们乐队一直都在那家酒吧演出

translation.en: but last night, Mr. Sam Gold from Sam Gold Records was coming in to see us.
translation.zh:
‎但是昨晚山姆金唱片公司的老板
‎也就是山姆金来看我们

translation.en: He's one of the biggest producers in country music.
translation.zh: ‎他是乡村音乐界最具权威的制作人

translation.en: If he likes you, it can change your whole life.
translation.zh: ‎如果他看上你 你整个人生都会改变

translation.en: And not to toot our own horns, but we crushed it.
translation.zh:
‎不是我自吹自擂
‎但我们昨晚真的唱得很好

translation.en: ♪ Dream baby got me dreaming sweet dreams The whole day through ♪
translation.zh: ‎梦中宝贝 让我做一整天的美梦吧

translation.en: ♪ Dream baby got me dreaming sweet dreams Nighttime, too ♪
translation.zh: ‎梦中宝贝 让我做一整天的美梦吧 ‎晚上也要做美梦

translation.en: ♪ I love you and I'm dreaming of you But that won't do ♪
translation.zh: ‎我爱你 我梦见你 但这样不行

translation.en: ♪ Dream baby, make me stop my dreaming You can make my dreams come true ♪
translation.zh:
‎梦中宝贝 别让我再做梦了
‎你能让美梦成真

translation.en: Turns out, Mr. Sam Gold didn't think we crushed it
translation.zh: ‎但山姆金先生觉得我们唱得不好

translation.en: the way I thought we crushed it, and I was crushed.
translation.zh:
‎我还以为我们唱得很好
‎于是我崩溃了

translation.en: So, why are you in our house?
translation.zh: ‎那你怎么会来到我们家？

translation.en: Needless to say, I was pretty devastated,
translation.zh: ‎不用多说 我当时挺难过的

translation.en: but Boone didn't wanna wallow in our misery.
translation.zh: ‎但布恩不想沉浸在伤痛中

translation.en: He wanted to talk about our future.
translation.zh: ‎他想要谈谈我们的未来

translation.en: Bailey, you know how much I love you, right?
translation.zh: ‎贝莉 你知道我有多爱你吧？

translation.en: I do. Yeah, I do.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 没错 我愿意

translation.en: I do. Oh my gosh, Boone, you're not… [gasps]
translation.zh: ‎我愿意 天啊 布恩 你该不会要…

translation.en: [laughing] Lord have mercy, you are!
translation.zh: ‎天啊 你来真的

translation.en: The answer is yes!
translation.zh: ‎我的答案是“愿意”

translation.en: I will! I will!
translation.zh: ‎我愿意！

translation.en: You will what?
translation.zh: ‎你愿意什么？

translation.en: Let you go on.
translation.zh: ‎我让你继续说吧

translation.en: Go on.
translation.zh: ‎继续说吧

translation.en: Right. The thing is, the boys and I've been talking,
translation.zh:
‎是这样的
‎我和那几个男人一直在讨论

translation.en: and we decided that if tonight was a bust, which it most surely was,
translation.zh:
‎我们认为今晚演出失败
‎这点是肯定的

translation.en: that we, the band, needed to make some… some changes, you know?
translation.zh:
‎因此我们这支乐队必须做出改变
‎你懂吧？

translation.en: Shake things up a bit. Go in a different direction.
translation.zh: ‎就是稍微改变一下 转换方向

translation.en: Okay. What direction?
translation.zh: ‎好啊 什么方向？

translation.en: You're out.
translation.zh: ‎你退出

translation.en: -She's in. -What?
translation.zh:
‎-她加入
‎-什么？

translation.en: Bailey, the band's been together for nine years and we still haven't made it.
translation.zh:
‎贝莉 这支乐队已经成立九年了
‎到现在还没闯出名堂

translation.en: I mean, someone has to change.
translation.zh: ‎总得换个人

translation.en: So you're trading me in for her?
translation.zh: ‎所以你让她来取代我？

translation.en: I mean, just professionally.
translation.zh: ‎仅限于工作上

translation.en: But it is all good. Because who still loves Bailey?
translation.zh: ‎这是好事 因为谁还爱着贝莉呢？

translation.en: This guy!
translation.zh: ‎这个男人！

translation.en: Are you out of your mind, Boone? We're a team! Together forever!
translation.zh:
‎布恩 你疯了吗？
‎我们是个团队 永远不分开！

translation.en: You either take all of me… or none of me!
translation.zh:
‎要么把我的人和心都留住
‎要么彻底甩掉我！

translation.en: [sobs] He picked none of me.
translation.zh: ‎他选择了彻底甩掉我

translation.en: Oh, you poor thing.
translation.zh: ‎真可怜

translation.en: I am gonna call you an Uber this minute to take you home.
translation.zh:
‎我马上打电话叫优步
‎立刻送你回家

translation.en: I don't have a home. Me and Boone lived together.
translation.zh: ‎我没有家 我以前跟布恩住在一起

translation.en: So that's why you were driving all night in this storm? You had no place to go?
translation.zh:
‎所以你才在暴风雨夜中开车吗？
‎只因为你无家可归？

translation.en: No. Can you believe it? In one night, I lost my home, my career, and my man.
translation.zh:
‎没错 是不是很不可思议？
‎我一夜间失去了家、事业和男朋友

translation.en: So,
translation.zh: ‎那你是说…

translation.en: you're single?
translation.zh: ‎你目前单身？

translation.en: Listen, if someone could please just give me a ride to the service station--
translation.zh:
‎听着 我希望有人能开车送我到
‎离这里最近的维修厂…

translation.en: -[Chloe] Tornado! -All right, come on.
translation.zh:
‎-龙卷风来了！
‎-好 快点

translation.en: Y'all know the drill. Everyone in the basement.
translation.zh:
‎你们都知道怎么做了
‎大家快躲进地下室

translation.en: [Summer] Wait for me!
translation.zh: ‎等等我！

translation.en: I know you don't know me,
translation.zh: ‎听着 我知道你们不认识我

translation.en: so I understand if you don't want me to come down-- I'm coming down.
translation.zh:
‎所以我理解你们不肯让我下去…
‎我下去了

translation.en: Y'all?
translation.zh: ‎有人吗？

translation.en: [screams] Y'all!
translation.zh: ‎有人吗？

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: ‎对不起

translation.en: [Beau] Oh, careful on those stairs, Bailey. They're very steep.
translation.zh: ‎贝莉 小心阶梯 非常陡峭

translation.en: No, don't worry about me, sugar.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 不用担心我

translation.en: My stilettos are much safer than her flat steel-toed boots.
translation.zh:
‎我这双高跟鞋
‎可比她那双平底铁头靴安全多了

translation.en: So, this is how it all ends.
translation.zh: ‎这就是人生的终点了吧

translation.en: What's under there?
translation.zh: ‎下面是什么？

translation.en: It's the last nine nannies.
translation.zh: ‎之前的九个保姆

translation.en: You're kidding, right?
translation.zh: ‎你在开玩笑吧？

translation.en: Oh, honey. You're shiverin'.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 你在发抖

translation.en: Y'all are so lucky to have each other. In times like these,
translation.zh:
‎在这种时刻 你们拥有彼此的陪伴
‎真是莫大的幸福

translation.en: I guess I'll have to ride out the rest of the tornadoes in my life alone.
translation.zh:
‎看来我日后
‎只能孤伶伶地闯荡人生风暴了

translation.en: Darlin', I'm sure there's someone special waiting for you.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的
‎我相信肯定有个特别的人在等着你

translation.en: Out there.
translation.zh: ‎只是不在这里

translation.en: I sure do envy y'all. You all have such a beautiful family.
translation.zh: ‎真羡慕你们 真是个幸福美满的家

translation.en: Thank you. Where's your family, Bailey?
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 那你的家人呢 贝莉？

translation.en: Oh, I don't really have much of a family other than Boone.
translation.zh: ‎布恩应该是我唯一的家人吧

translation.en: And, well, you know what happened there.
translation.zh: ‎你们也知道我们分手了

translation.en: As far as my other family, my mama ran out on me when I was two.
translation.zh:
‎至于我其他家人嘛
‎我妈妈在我两岁那年就弃我而去了

translation.en: Who would walk out on you?
translation.zh: ‎谁舍得弃你而去啊？

translation.en: So far, Boone and her mama. And she's just gettin' started.
translation.zh:
‎不就是布恩和她妈妈吗？
‎这只是个开始

translation.en: -[girl] I've got you, Chlo. -[Beau] Boys! Over here.
translation.zh:
‎-我保护你 蔻依
‎-小子们 快过来！

translation.en: ♪ I've been cheated, been mistreated ♪
translation.zh: ‎我被背叛 受尽委屈

translation.en: ♪ When will I be loved? ♪
translation.zh: ‎什么时候才会被爱？

translation.en: ♪ I've been put down I've been pushed round ♪
translation.zh: ‎我被抛弃 被人耍了

translation.en: ♪ When will I be loved? ♪
translation.zh: ‎什么时候才会被爱？

translation.en: ♪ When I find a new man That I want for mine ♪
translation.zh: ‎每次找到一个满意的新对象

translation.en: ♪ Always breaks my heart in two ♪
translation.zh: ‎他总是把我的心分成两半

translation.en: ♪ It happens every time ♪
translation.zh: ‎每次都是这样

translation.en: ♪ I've been cheated, been mistreated ♪
translation.zh: ‎我被背叛 受尽委屈

translation.en: ♪ When will I be-- ♪
translation.zh: ‎我什么时候才会…

translation.en: Stop! Stop!
translation.zh: ‎别唱了！

translation.en: She doesn't like The Everly Brothers?
translation.zh: ‎她不喜欢埃弗里兄弟吗？

translation.en: I can do Doobie or Jonas.
translation.zh: ‎我也会唱杜比兄弟和乔纳斯兄弟的歌

translation.en: [Beau] Cassidy?
translation.zh: ‎卡西迪？

translation.en: -Cassidy, baby, open the door. -What's happening?
translation.zh:
‎-卡西迪 宝贝 快开门
‎-怎么回事？

translation.en: -[Beau] Honey, please. -I got ten bucks on her not opening it.
translation.zh:
‎-亲爱的 求你开门吧
‎-我赌十块她不会开门

translation.en: -Sweetheart, this has gotta stop. -What's gotta stop?
translation.zh:
‎-你不能再这样下去了
‎-为什么不能再这样下去？

translation.en: You keep saying you're fine, but this is not a good indication.
translation.zh:
‎你一直说你没事
‎但你这种反应就说明你有事

translation.en: What's she indicatin' she's not fine about?
translation.zh: ‎说明她有什么事？？

translation.en: Honey, it's been almost two years since your mama passed.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的 你妈妈已经过世两年了
‎当我求你了

translation.en: Please, just stop shuttin' us out.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的 你妈妈已经过世两年了
‎当我求你了 ‎别再把我们挡在门外了 亲爱的？

translation.en: Baby?
translation.zh: ‎别再把我们挡在门外了 亲爱的？

translation.en: I think maybe she needs a woman's touch.
translation.zh: ‎我想她可能需要一个女人来疼疼

translation.en: I'm uppin' it to 50.
translation.zh: ‎我要把赌注加到五十块

translation.en: Cassidy? Cass?
translation.zh: ‎卡西迪？小卡？

translation.en: G-friend?
translation.zh: ‎好姐妹？

translation.en: I don't know what to do anymore. I mean, what am I supposed to do?
translation.zh:
‎我都不知道还能怎么办了
‎我能怎么办呢？

translation.en: She won't talk to me or a psychiatrist. She won't even cry.
translation.zh:
‎她不想跟我和心理医生聊
‎连哭也哭不出来

translation.en: She hasn't shed one tear since her mama died, and that's not normal.
translation.zh:
‎她妈妈过世后 她还没流过一滴眼泪
‎这样不正常

translation.en: -Let's keep goin'. We were cookin'. -What about your sister?
translation.zh:
‎-我们继续唱吧 我们唱得很好
‎-那你妹妹怎么办？

translation.en: -She's the reason we can't play. -Tuck!
translation.zh:
‎-她就是我们不能玩音乐的祸首
‎-塔克！

translation.en: I'm sorry, Daddy, but it's been two years. We had a band with our mama,
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 老爸 已经两年了
‎我们跟妈妈组过一支乐队

translation.en: but since she died, we haven't been allowed
translation.zh:
‎但自从妈妈过世后
‎我们都不准碰这些乐器

translation.en: to touch these instruments. Because of her.
translation.zh:
‎但自从妈妈过世后
‎我们都不准碰这些乐器 ‎-都是因为她
‎-塔克 够了

translation.en: Tuck, enough.
translation.zh:
‎-都是因为她
‎-塔克 够了

translation.en: I agree. It is enough.
translation.zh: ‎没错 够了

translation.en: For two years, we've had to watch everything we do and say in front of her.
translation.zh:
‎过去两年以来
‎我们在她面前都要顾及言行举止

translation.en: Don't mention Mama in front of Cassidy.
translation.zh: ‎不准在卡西迪面前提起妈妈

translation.en: Don't play music in front of Cassidy. Well, we lost our mama, too.
translation.zh:
‎不准在卡西迪面前玩音乐
‎不是只有她失去妈妈

translation.en: Why does our whole family have to live by her rules?
translation.zh:
‎为什么我们一家人
‎非要按照她的规定生活？

translation.en: No, Cassidy.
translation.zh: ‎别上去 卡西迪

translation.en: -[Chloe] Daddy, no! -I'll go, Daddy.
translation.zh:
‎-老爸 别走！
‎-老爸 我去追

translation.en: -No, I will. -None of y'all are going out there.
translation.zh:
‎-别去 我去追
‎-谁也不准出去

translation.en: -She probably went to her room. -We go, we'll find her faster.
translation.zh:
‎-她可能只是回去自己的房间
‎-我们俩去找比较快

translation.en: -Why don't all of three of us-- -Bailey went.
translation.zh:
‎-不如我们所有人…
‎-贝莉去了

translation.en: Cassidy?
translation.zh: ‎卡西迪？

translation.en: Cassidy!
translation.zh: ‎卡西迪？

translation.en: Cassidy?
translation.zh: ‎卡西迪？

translation.en: [Bailey] Cassidy?
translation.zh: ‎卡西迪？

translation.en: I know you're in here.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你在这里

translation.en: It's the only place out here that has a cover.
translation.zh: ‎这是唯一一个有遮盖的地方

translation.en: "Had" a cover.
translation.zh: ‎遮盖没了

translation.en: Come on, Cassidy. Even the horses had the good sense to get the heck out.
translation.zh:
‎出来吧 卡西迪
‎就连马儿也有危机意识

translation.en: Look at me. Cryin' like a fool.
translation.zh: ‎瞧瞧我 哭得像个傻子

translation.en: Wipin' myself with the jacket he gave me. Boone gave me this jacket
translation.zh:
‎用他送我的外套擦眼泪
‎这是布恩在他第一次说爱我的那一夜

translation.en: the first night he told me he loved me, Cassidy. I hate this jacket!
translation.zh:
‎送给我的外套 卡西迪
‎我恨这件外套了！

translation.en: But I love him.
translation.zh: ‎可是我爱他

translation.en: And I love this jacket.
translation.zh: ‎我也爱这件外套

translation.en: Okay. All right.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 行了 卡西迪
‎对不起 我不应该拿起吉他边弹边唱

translation.en: Cassidy, I'm sorry about the guitar and the singin', okay?
translation.zh:
‎好吧 行了 卡西迪
‎对不起 我不应该拿起吉他边弹边唱 ‎好吗？如果我知道你还没放下
‎我就不会…

translation.en: I never would've done it if--
translation.zh:
‎好吗？如果我知道你还没放下
‎我就不会…

translation.en: [yells] Oh, Cassidy, I don't wanna die!
translation.zh: ‎天啊 卡西迪 我不想死啊！

translation.en: Last night was a different story, but…
translation.zh: ‎虽然昨晚我真的很想死

translation.en: I mean, if I never saw the sun come up, I did not care.
translation.zh:
‎昨晚我心想
‎如果看不到隔天早上的太阳也无所谓

translation.en: But then, honey, some kind of miracle happened.
translation.zh: ‎可是亲爱的 奇迹发生了

translation.en: I heard this voice callin' out to me.
translation.zh: ‎我听到一把声音在呼唤我

translation.en: "What doesn't kill you makes you stronger. Stand a little taller…
translation.zh:
‎“无法置你于死地的伤害
‎会使你更坚强 站得更高”

translation.en: somethin'-somethin'-somethin' when I'm alone."
translation.zh: ‎还有“我孤独不代表我‘什么’”

translation.en: And that's when I knew God was trying to send me a message via Kelly Clarkson.
translation.zh:
‎那一刻 我意识到
‎上帝要通过凯莉克莱森传达信息给我

translation.en: And now Kelly Clarkson, via me, is sending it to you.
translation.zh:
‎如今凯莉克莱森通过我
‎把信息传达给你

translation.en: You gotta be strong.
translation.zh: ‎你要坚强起来

translation.en: You gotta carry on.
translation.zh: ‎你要坚持下去

translation.en: -You gotta-- -[Cassidy] Good Lord.
translation.zh:
‎-你要…
‎-天啊

translation.en: All I've been hearing about since you got here is this guy broke your heart,
translation.zh:
‎自从你踏进我们家 我只听到你说
‎某个男人伤了你的心

translation.en: you got nowhere to live, your career's over.
translation.zh: ‎你失去了家 没了事业

translation.en: And I'm so sorry about that, Cassidy. But right now, we need to--
translation.zh: ‎十分抱歉 卡西迪 但这一刻 我们要…

translation.en: This is my mama's guitar!
translation.zh: ‎这是我妈妈的吉他！

translation.en: It's all I have left of her, and you just pick it up like it's nothing!
translation.zh:
‎这是她唯一的遗物
‎你就这样随意抄起它 ‎好像无所谓似的

translation.en: It's everything!
translation.zh: ‎它是我的一切！

translation.en: She was everything, and now she's gone!
translation.zh: ‎我妈妈是我的一切 如今她不在了！

translation.en: And it's not fair!
translation.zh: ‎这不公平！

translation.en: No, you're right, life is not fair. Which we won't have if we don't get outta here!
translation.zh:
‎没错 你说得对 生命本来就不公平
‎但如果我们再不离开这里 ‎就连命也没了

translation.en: Who cares?
translation.zh: ‎谁在乎？

translation.en: No, don't talk like that. Your mama wouldn't want you talking like that.
translation.zh:
‎别这么说
‎你妈妈绝对不想听到你这么说话

translation.en: -How do you know what my mama'd want? -Well, I know she'd want you to be happy.
translation.zh:
‎-你怎么知道我妈妈想要什么？
‎-我知道她希望你快乐

translation.en: How do you know I'm not happy? A guess?
translation.zh:
‎-你怎么知道我不快乐？
‎-我猜的 好吗？

translation.en: Well, if I'm not happy, it's 'cause for two years
translation.zh: ‎我不快乐 是因为过去两年以来

translation.en: everyone's been telling me what to do and how to feel. -I hate it! -Good!
translation.zh:
‎大家都在叫我该怎么做、该怎么感受
‎我恨死了！

translation.en: Just keep yelling. Just get it out as we walk.
translation.zh: ‎很好 继续喊吧 我们边喊边走

translation.en: I hate everything! Walk and talk! Walk and talk!
translation.zh:
‎-我恨这一切！
‎-边走边说

translation.en: Especially Summer.
translation.zh: ‎尤其是莎莫

translation.en: I hate Summer so much!
translation.zh: ‎我恨死莎莫了！

translation.en: I'm guessing the girlfriend, not the season?
translation.zh:
‎我猜你是指你老爸的女朋友
‎不是某种气候吧？

translation.en: How could he be with her?
translation.zh: ‎老爸怎么可以跟她在一起？

translation.en: -Doesn't he love my mama anymore? -Of course he loves her.
translation.zh:
‎-他不爱妈妈了吗？
‎-他当然爱你妈妈

translation.en: But you should talk to him about it in the house!
translation.zh: ‎你们应该在屋里讨论这个话题！

translation.en: I can't.
translation.zh: ‎我做不到

translation.en: [sobbing] I can't talk to anybody except my mama!
translation.zh: ‎我只能跟我妈妈说话

translation.en: Cassidy…
translation.zh: ‎卡西迪…

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I… I know how painful it is. And honey,
translation.zh:
‎我替你感到非常难过
‎我知道你有多痛苦 亲爱的

translation.en: finally letting go like this is a good thing. All that--
translation.zh:
‎像你这样终于把悲伤释放出来
‎是一件好事

translation.en: -[wood splinters] -[Bailey] Oh my God, Cassidy! God.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 卡西迪！ ‎天啊

translation.en: It'd be so much more helpful if you would just move your feet.
translation.zh:
‎如果你的脚能动一动
‎我就不用那么费力

translation.en: Draggin' works, too.
translation.zh: ‎拖着走也行

translation.en: -Oh, thank God. I found her. -You found her?
translation.zh:
‎-谢天谢地 我找到她了
‎-“你”找到她？

translation.en: [Cassidy] Daddy! It's okay. It's okay.
translation.zh:
‎-爸爸！
‎-嗨 宝贝 没事了

translation.en: Hug and walk. Hug and walk.
translation.zh: ‎边抱边走

translation.en: Hey. Mornin'.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 早上好

translation.en: Oh, you're up. You're here. I'm just gonna go to the dryer and grab my clothes.
translation.zh:
‎你醒了 原来你在这里
‎我只是想去烘干机取回我的衣服

translation.en: Oh, by the way, that pillow top mattress… It's like I died and went to heaven.
translation.zh:
‎对了 那张双垫层床垫
‎让我睡死上天堂了

translation.en: Not died. Not heaven. Oh God, Cassidy's not here, is she?
translation.zh:
‎没死 没上天堂
‎天啊 卡西迪不在这里吧？

translation.en: She is still sleeping. I don't remember the last time she slept this late.
translation.zh:
‎她还没睡醒 我不记得
‎她上次睡到这么晚是什么时候了

translation.en: [sighs] Oh, that makes me so happy.
translation.zh: ‎听了我很高兴

translation.en: Okay, I'm just gonna go grab my clothes.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我去取回我的衣服了

translation.en: [Beau] Oh, they're right here.
translation.zh: ‎对了 衣服都在这里

translation.en: You folded my laundry?
translation.zh: ‎你帮我把衣服折好了？

translation.en: No man has ever folded my laundry. Not to imply there have been so many men,
translation.zh:
‎不曾有男人帮我折过衣服
‎我不是指我有很多男人

translation.en: but the man I was with never once folded my laundry,
translation.zh: ‎只是我的前男朋友不曾为我折过衣服

translation.en: never once did a dish, and twice forgot my birthday.
translation.zh:
‎不曾为我洗过盘碗
‎还忘记过我的生日两次

translation.en: Sure can pick 'em.
translation.zh: ‎只能说我没眼光

translation.en: Well, It is the least I could do. I mean, you brought my little girl back.
translation.zh:
‎我只能为你做这么多
‎你让我小女儿又恢复了活力

translation.en: -What else can I do to thank you? -Coffee'd be nice.
translation.zh:
‎-我还能怎么感谢你呢？
‎-请我喝咖啡就够了

translation.en: Oh, thank goodness. I thought you were gonna ask for cash.
translation.zh: ‎谢天谢地 我还以为你会跟我要钱

translation.en: -How do you take it? -Fifties would be nice.
translation.zh:
‎-要不要加点什么？
‎-就五十块吧

translation.en: Oh, I hope you're giving her money to buy pants.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 希望你会给她钱去买裤子吧

translation.en: See, I know those pajamas come with pants 'cause I gave 'em to Beau for Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎我知道这件睡衣是整套的
‎因为那是我买给保哥的圣诞礼物

translation.en: Okay, well, I'm just gonna throw these pants on.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 那我就赶紧穿上这件裤子

translation.en: Well, Bailey… how soon can you start?
translation.zh: ‎贝莉 你什么时候能开始？

translation.en: Start? I already got my second leg in.
translation.zh: ‎开始？我第二条腿已经进去了

translation.en: I mean, how soon can you start as our nanny?
translation.zh:
‎我是问你什么时候能开始
‎当我们家的保姆？房间已经准备好了

translation.en: The room's already fixed up, and you said you liked the mattress.
translation.zh:
‎我是问你什么时候能开始
‎当我们家的保姆？房间已经准备好了 ‎-你也说你喜欢那张床垫
‎-亲爱的 但她不是保姆 你忘了吗？

translation.en: But darlin', she's not a nanny, remember?
translation.zh:
‎-你也说你喜欢那张床垫
‎-亲爱的 但她不是保姆 你忘了吗？

translation.en: Well, she could've fooled me.
translation.zh: ‎我还真以为她是个保姆

translation.en: I've never seen the kids respond to anybody like this.
translation.zh:
‎我没看过孩子们
‎对任何一个保姆的反应这么好

translation.en: Yeah, but she's not a professional. I bet she doesn't even know CPR.
translation.zh:
‎没错 但她不是专业保姆
‎我猜她根本不懂心肺复苏术吧

translation.en: -No, I know CPR. -Do you know the Heimlich?
translation.zh:
‎-不是 我懂心肺复苏术
‎-海姆里克法呢？

translation.en: -I do. -Do you know where Beau keeps the bourbon?
translation.zh:
‎-也懂
‎-你知道保哥把波本酒藏在哪里吗？

translation.en: Well, Summer's right. I'm not a nanny, I'm a singer.
translation.zh: ‎沙漠说得对 我不是保姆 我是歌手

translation.en: Been my dream since I was four years old.
translation.zh: ‎我从四岁开始就梦想当歌手了

translation.en: Well, you can't give up on your dream!
translation.zh: ‎可不是吗？你不能放弃梦想

translation.en: Well, things are a little tougher now that my dream's turned into a nightmare.
translation.zh:
‎情况比以前困难了
‎我的梦想已经变成了一场噩梦

translation.en: I got no money, no place to sing, nowhere to live.
translation.zh:
‎我身无分文
‎失去演出地点 也无家可归

translation.en: Maybe I should try this nanny thing.
translation.zh: ‎也许我应该试试当保姆

translation.en: -You're stayin'? -Yes, she's stayin'!
translation.zh:
‎-你会留下来吗？
‎-太好了 她留下来了！

translation.en: Hold on. She hasn't said yes yet.
translation.zh: ‎等一下 她还没答应呢

translation.en: Let me handle this, Daddy. Name your price, Bailey.
translation.zh: ‎交给我吧 老爸 ‎贝莉 说吧 你要多少钱？

translation.en: Everybody's got a price. And don't settle. He squeezes the quarter so tight,
translation.zh:
‎每个人心里都有个数字 你值得更多
‎一铢一两

translation.en: the eagle screams.
translation.zh: ‎都要斤斤计较

translation.en: But Bailey doesn't want to be a nanny, she wants to be a singer.
translation.zh: ‎但贝莉不想当保姆 她想当歌手

translation.en: Well, why can't you be a nanny and a singer?
translation.zh: ‎不能同时当保姆和歌手吗？

translation.en: Yeah, Maria from The Sound of Music was a singer, a nanny, and a nun.
translation.zh:
‎《音乐之声》里的玛丽亚
‎也是个歌手、保姆兼修女啊

translation.en: That horse has already left the barn.
translation.zh:
‎生米煮成熟饭了
‎我已经不能当修女了

translation.en: I don't get it.
translation.zh: ‎我不明白

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: ‎很好

translation.en: If you move in with us, you'll have an even better shot at being a singer.
translation.zh:
‎贝莉 如果你搬来跟我们一起住
‎那你当歌手的机会就更高了

translation.en: Trust me. You got talent, kid. The only reason you haven't made it
translation.zh:
‎相信我 丫头 你有天分
‎你之所以还没走红

translation.en: is because you've been lacking decent management.
translation.zh: ‎是因为没有一个出色的经纪公司

translation.en: But the good news is, you stay here, I'm willing to offer you a mere 20%.
translation.zh:
‎好消息是 只要你愿意留下来
‎我愿意跟你“二八开”

translation.en: Managers only charge ten. Fifteen it is.
translation.zh:
‎-经纪人通常只拿收入的10%
‎-那就“五五开”

translation.en: Well, morning, sleepyhead.
translation.zh: ‎早上好 睡虫

translation.en: What time is it? Time to celebrate.
translation.zh:
‎-现在几点了？
‎-是时候庆祝了

translation.en: Bailey's gonna be our new nanny! Unless you have any objections, Cass.
translation.zh:
‎-贝莉将成为我们的新保姆！
‎-除非你反对 小卡

translation.en: But she is not a nanny, Cassidy.
translation.zh: ‎但她不是个保姆 卡西迪

translation.en: And I appeal to you, as the responsible lady of the house,
translation.zh:
‎请听我这句劝
‎你作为这个家的女主人

translation.en: do you think it's a good idea to put your life and the lives of your siblings
translation.zh: ‎你觉得把你和几个兄妹的性命

translation.en: in the hands of someone who's just not a professional?
translation.zh: ‎交到一个非专业保姆手上合适吗？

translation.en: Let me tell you a little story, Summer.
translation.zh: ‎沙漠 让我跟你说个小故事

translation.en: Once upon a time, we had a chicken named Naomi.
translation.zh:
‎很久以前
‎我们家养了一只叫娜奥米的鸡

translation.en: Mama named her after Naomi Judd ‘cause they both battled depression.
translation.zh:
‎妈妈取名的灵感来自娜奥米贾德
‎因为她和那只鸡都在跟忧郁症抗争

translation.en: Well, we found out the reason our Naomi was so sad
translation.zh: ‎后来我们发现娜奥米郁郁寡欢

translation.en: was ‘cause she was laying fewer and fewer eggs,
translation.zh: ‎是因为它下蛋不多

translation.en: and started to feel like the best years of her life were behind her.
translation.zh:
‎它开始觉得生命中最美好的那几年
‎已经过去了

translation.en: I feel that's what's happening to Bailey.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得贝莉也是这种情况

translation.en: I mean, what has she got left?
translation.zh: ‎她还剩下什么？

translation.en: She lost her man, her home, her career.
translation.zh: ‎她没了男朋友 失去了家和事业

translation.en: And like Naomi, she's no spring chicken.
translation.zh: ‎就跟娜奥米一样 青春不再

translation.en: What are you sayin', darlin'?
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 你这话是什么意思？

translation.en: I'm sayin', we didn't get rid of Naomi.
translation.zh:
‎我想说的是
‎当初我们也没遗弃娜奥米

translation.en: So you want me to stay?
translation.zh: ‎所以你是希望我留下来吗？

translation.en: Who else is gonna take you? [sobs] No one!
translation.zh:
‎-不然谁要收留你呢？
‎-没人！

translation.en: All right, well, welcome to the family, Naomi.
translation.zh: ‎那就好 欢迎加入这个家 娜奥米
